about_the_game:
The [Concealed] Original Game Soundtrack features 15 original music tracks that appeared in the [Concealed] game.The soundtrack is available in both MP3 and WAV formats

P.S. In the OST, 2 pieces of music (Thread of Fate / Shallow Valley) created by Akira Yamaoka are not included for now because of copyright issues in Japan, but they will be added in the near future. We are sorry for the inconvenience.

content_descriptors.notes: This game contains ghost and demon and dead people and animals with the graphical scene.

name: Concealed  Soundtrack

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Storage: 50 MB available space
  • Storage (high-quality audio): Additional 50 GB available space

short_description: The [Concealed] Original Game Soundtrack includes several original game music tracks.
